It is the voice of Layla, a seeker of truth in a world shrouded in mystery. Her quest has led her to you, weary traveler, for she senses in you the spark of curiosity and determination needed to unravel the enigmas that lie ahead. Will you heed her call, embracing the unknown and venturing into the depths of uncertainty?
